attributes.action: Stop the charge of disposing of domestic waist
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Local authorities should not charge residents to dispose of domestic waist untill the GOVERNMENT stop the manufacturers from using excessive and unnessasery packaging just to make their products more attractive to the comsumer.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
